title: [Neuroscience] Largest study to date reveals anorexia can lead to dramatic changes in brain structure.Based on a total of 1,648 female brain scans, researchers found decreases in cortical thickness, subcortical volumes and cortical surface area in people with anorexia. Essentially, the brain sort-of shrinks down.
